projectArray.title: My Website
projectArray.summary: This page is a personal website made with React.js and Bootstrap.The component is made into a single file component using zeit/styled-jsx.

projectArray.title: Message Board
projectArray.summary: Simple message board with separate front and back ends. The front and back ends are deployed on GitHub and Heroku.

projectArray.title: Landing Page
